about_the_game:
"The Guestlist" is a spine-chilling horror game that will keep you on the edge of your seat from start to finish.

The Guestlist is a short game - about 1 to 2 hours of playtime.

This is mostly a "walking simulator" where you walk around a creepy hotel and try to survive different entities stalking you.


You are a traveler who gets stranded in an isolated hotel during a thunderstorm, you must navigate a haunting environment full of jumpscares and terrifying secrets.

The eccentric guests that you encounter are far from ordinary, and as you explore the hotel and interact with them, you'll discover that there's more to this place than meets the eye.

With its immersive environment, spine-chilling jump scares, and engrossing story, "The Guestlist" is a must-play game for fans of horror and suspense. It's a game that will keep you up at night, wondering what's lurking around the next corner.

As you navigate the eerie hallways and rooms, you'll encounter various puzzles that must be solved in order to unlock new paths and uncover the hotel's hidden secrets.

These puzzles will challenge your mind and test your wits as you try to unravel the mysteries of the hotel.

From decoding cryptic messages to manipulating objects in the environment, each puzzle offers a unique and engaging challenge that will keep you on your toes.


As you explore the hotel and interact with the guests, you'll gradually uncover the dark secrets that lurk within its walls. Each guest has their own story to tell, and by piecing together their tales, you'll learn the truth about what happened at the hotel and why it's so haunted.

Depending on your relationship with the guests, you may get different endings.

Do you have what it takes to survive the night in the hotel, or will you become just another victim of its dark secrets? Play "The Guestlist" to find out.
